alert.note: Alert for Mahaska; Marion; Monroe; Wapello (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 7:44AM CDT until July 17 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Monroe County in south central Iowa... Northwestern Wapello County in southeastern Iowa... Southern Marion County in south central Iowa... Southern Mahaska County in south central Iowa... * Until 830 AM CDT. * At 744 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Melcher-Dallas, or 6 miles west of Knoxville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Oskaloosa, Knoxville, Pleasantville, Melcher-Dallas, Eddyville, Knoxville Raceway, Lake Red Rock, Fremont, Lovilia, Beacon, University Park, Bussey, Harvey, Rose Hill, Kirkville, Leighton, Hamilton, Chillicothe, Keomah Village and Marysville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
